Firefly server API

Here is a simple and exhaustive description of the firefly server API using a swagger.

View on GitHub
Firefly server API

/tasks

GET List all tasks

Responses

200 Array of tasks.

POST

Parameters

Name Located in Description Type
body body Task we want to create. String

Responses

200 Value of the freshly created task.

/tasks/{id}

GET

Parameters

Name Located in Description Type
id path Task ID Integer

Responses

200 Get a task by id.

/tasks/{id}/progress/{progress}

PARAMETERS

GET

Responses

200 Get the progress of a task from last progress id.
410 The task is not running anymore so operations are gone. Now use the result endpoint.

/tasks/{id}/result

PARAMETERS

GET

Responses

200 Get the final result of a task.
404 There is no result for this task because it is probably running.
firefly-server is maintained by celian-garcia. This page was generated by GitHub Pages.
